channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous paving/cover, 28th September
item.description:
This is sticking up about two inches above the pavement level and yesterday an elderly woman tripped on it and fell badly. It’s in the area close to the out of use phone box before Londis

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lauriston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water pouring from manhole, 28th September
item.description:
The water is substantial and comes from at least two manholes that I can see and it’s causing people to slip

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gordon Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Sunken road on Rotherhithe street near bus stop Bryan RoadSurrey Docks Farm, 28th September
item.description:
The road on Rotherhithe street near C10 bus stop Bryan Road Surrey Docks farm has sunk. The road crossing from durand wharf has sunk on on side making a huge depresion on the road. Cars buses have to stop to navigate the sunken road to avoid damage to vehicles. The road stretch from c10 bus stop bryan road surrey docks farm to redriff road is litteredwith sunken roads for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal poster outside house on lamppost, 28th September
item.description:
Unsightly illegal poster been hung on a lamppost outside our home. Not only is this poster unsightly, it is taking away the sight of the no parking on pavement poster. People have been parking there and also ignoring this sign. Please can this be sorted soon as it’s not the first time this driveway company has hung their sign. Issue in hand has been hung outside 66/68 lansdowne avenue Bexleyheath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdowne Avenue, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
